### 5.2 æ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨

#### 5.2.1 ä½¿ç”¨ SQLite å­˜å‚¨

**ä¼ è¾“å†å²è¡¨**ï¼š

```sql
CREATE TABLE transfer_history (
    id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    file_size INTEGER NOT NULL,
    file_path TEXT,
    direction TEXT NOT NULL,  -- 'send' or 'receive'
    source_device TEXT,
    target_device TEXT NOT NULL,
    status TEXT NOT NULL,  -- 'success', 'failed', 'cancelled'
    speed REAL,
    start_time INTEGER NOT NULL,
    end_time INTEGER,
    error_message TEXT,
    file_hash TEXT,
    created_at INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT (strftime('%s', 'now'))
);

CREATE INDEX idx_transfer_history_direction ON transfer_history(direction);
CREATE INDEX idx_transfer_history_status ON transfer_history(status);
CREATE INDEX idx_transfer_history_start_time ON transfer_history(start_time);
CREATE INDEX idx_transfer_history_target_device ON transfer_history(target_device);
```

**è®¾å¤‡å†å²è¡¨**ï¼š

```sql
CREATE TABLE device_history (
    id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    device_type TEXT NOT NULL,  -- 'desktop', 'mobile', 'unknown'
    address TEXT NOT NULL,
    port INTEGER NOT NULL,
    device_id TEXT,
    first_connected INTEGER NOT NULL,
    last_connected INTEGER NOT NULL,
    connection_count INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    total_transfer_size INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    status TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'offline',  -- 'online', 'offline'
    is_favorite INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,  -- 0 or 1
    created_at INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT (strftime('%s', 'now')),
    updated_at INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT (strftime('%s', 'now'))
);

CREATE INDEX idx_device_history_status ON device_history(status);
CREATE INDEX idx_device_history_last_connected ON device_history(last_connected);
```

**åº”ç”¨é…ç½®è¡¨**ï¼š

```sql
CREATE TABLE app_config (
    key TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    value TEXT NOT NULL,
    updated_at INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT (strftime('%s', 'now'))
);
```

### 6.2 å®ç°æ­¥éª¤
